title: "Health Plan: A snake-like robot, real-time heart health and soft robotic implants"
excerpt: "In the final part of our Health Plan series, we see how a snake-like robot developed for remote inspection has been adapted for use in throat cancer surgery, look at a wearable ECG monitor, hear how soft robotic implants could be used for drug delivery, and speak to the company behind a device that continually monitors IV therapy."
